skill.improvableskills.miner_luck.desc: Increases the chance of dropping additional ores when mining (e.g., a chance to mine an extra diamond).
skill.improvableskills.vampirism.desc: Chance to replenish health when killing a mob or player.
skill.improvableskills.rabbit.desc: Increases player speed and jump boost.
skill.improvableskills.master_weapon.des: All weapons gain +0.2 damage per attribute level. Exception: Axe.
skill.improvableskills.beholder.desc: Bow/Crossbow damage is increased, and you see better at night.
skill.improvableskills.farmer.desc: You harvest crops more efficiently and get a discount from villagers who sell food.
skill.improvableskills.woodcutter.desc: Cuts wood faster. (Only wood) Increased axe damage and durability.
skill.improvableskills.fishbreath.desc: Improved maneuverability in water and longer underwater breathing time.
skill.improvableskills.starnavigator.des: Reduces food consumption and lowers the chance of encountering phantoms.
skill.improvableskills.creed.desc: You gain a chance to dodge, reducing incoming damage.
skill.improvableskills.eloquence.desc: You get a discount from villagers.
skill.improvableskills.merchanthand.desc: After gathering resources, they automatically appear in your inventory.
skill.improvableskills.aikido.desc: Has a chance to reflect damage back to the attacker, dealing some damage to them.
